00039   ethermux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) ?                          \
00040                         MinetConnect(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;

00042                         MinetConnect(MINET_ARP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;

00044                         MinetAccept(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00045 
00046   if (ethermux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX)) {
00047     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ethermux"));
00048     return -1;
00049   }
00050   if (ipmux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX)) {
00051     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from ipmux"));
00052     return -1;
00053   }

00055     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to arp_module"));

00068   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00069     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow

00089           unsigned char tos;

00098           if (flags&IP_HEADER_FLAG_DONTFRAG) {
00099             unsigned short id;
00100             iph.GetID(id);
00101             cerr << "   id bits (16) : "; PrintBits(cerr,(unsigned char*)&id,16,0); cerr <<endl;

00103             cerr << "   id bits (16) : NONE (DF not set)"<<endl;

00133         IPAddress toip;
00134         iph.GetDestIP(toip);
00135         if (toip==MyIPAddr || toip==IPAddress(IP_ADDRESS_BROADCAST)) {
00136           if (!(iph.IsChecksumCorrect())) {
00137             // discard the packet
00138             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent                             \
00139                         ("Discarding packet because header checksum is wrong."));
00140             cerr << "Discarding following packet because header checksum is wrong: "<<p<<"\n";
00141 
00142             IPAddress src;  iph.GetSourceIP(src);
00143             // "2" specifies the octet that is wrong (in this case, the checksum)
00144             ICMPPacket error(src, PARAMETER_PROBLEM, 2, p);
00145             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ICMP error message has been sent to host"));
00146 
00147             // add ethernet header
00148             IPHeader error_iph = error.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00149             IPAddress ipaddr;

00152                                    EthernetAddr(ETHERNET_BLANK_ADDR),

00166             MinetSend(ethermux, e);

00169           unsigned short fragoff;
00170           unsigned char flags;
00171           iph.GetFlags(flags);
00172           iph.GetFragOffset(fragoff);
00173           if ((flags&IP_HEADER_FLAG_MOREFRAG) || (fragoff!=0)) {
00174             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent                             \
00175                         ("Discarding packet because it is a fragment"));
00176             cerr << "Discarding following packet because it is a fragment: "<<p<<"\n";
00177             cerr << "NOTE: NO ICMP PACKET WAS SENT BACK\n";
00178

00180           }
00181           MinetSend(ipmux,p);

00284 
00285       }
00286       if (event.handle==ipmux) {
00287         Packet p;
00288         MinetReceive(ipmux,p);
00289         IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00290 
00291 #if DIFFUSION_HACK
00292         cerr << "IP Diffusion Enabled.  Inserted  bits follow..." << endl;
00293         if (DIFFUSION_RES_TOS) {
00294           unsigned char tos;
00295           iph.GetTOS(tos);
00296           if ((tos&0x3)==0) {
00297             unsigned char bits,bits2;
00298             GetNextBits(&bits,2,0);
00299             bits2=(bits>>6)&0x3;
00300             tos|=bits2;
00301             iph.SetTOS(tos);
00302             cerr << "   tos reserved bits (2) : "; PrintBits(cerr,&bits,2,0); cerr << endl;
00303           } else {
00304             cerr << "   tos reserved bits (2) : NONE (already set!)"<<endl;
00305           }
00306         }
00307         if (DIFFUSION_ID_DF) {
00308           unsigned char flags;
00309           iph.GetFlags(flags);
00310           if (flags&IP_HEADER_FLAG_DONTFRAG) {
00311             unsigned short id;
00312             GetNextBits((unsigned char*)&id,16,0);
00313             iph.SetID(id);
00314             cerr << "   id bits (16) : "; PrintBits(cerr,(unsigned char*)&id,16,0); cerr<<endl;
00315           } else {
00316             cerr << "   id bits (16) : NONE (DF not set)"<<endl;
00317           }
00318         }
00319         if (DIFFUSION_RES_FLAGS) {
00320           unsigned char flags;
00321           iph.GetFlags(flags);
00322           unsigned char bit = (flags&IP_HEADER_FLAG_RESERVED)>>2;
00323           if (!bit) {
00324             unsigned char bit2;
00325             GetNextBits(&bit,1,0);
00326             bit2=bit>>(7-2);
00327             flags|=bit2;
00328             iph.SetFlags(flags);
00329             cerr << "   Reserved flag bit (1) : "; PrintBits(cerr,&bit,1,0); cerr <<endl;
00330           } else {
00331             cerr << "   Reserved flag bit (1) : NONE (already set!)"<<endl;
00332           }
00333         }
00334         if (DIFFUSION_DF_FRAGOFF) {
00335           unsigned char flags;
00336           iph.GetFlags(flags);
00337           if (flags&IP_HEADER_FLAG_DONTFRAG) {
00338             unsigned short off;
00339             unsigned short bits;
00340             GetNextBits((unsigned char*)&bits,13,0);
00341             off=bits>>3;
00342             iph.SetFragOffset(off);
00343             flags&=~IP_HEADER_FLAG_MOREFRAG;
00344             iph.SetFlags(flags);
00345             cerr << "   Fragoff bits (13) : "; PrintBits(cerr,(unsigned char*)&bits,13,0); cerr <<endl;
00346           } else {
00347             cerr << "   Fragoff bits (13) : none (DF not set)"<<endl;
00348           }
00349         }
00350         if (DIFFUSION_CHECKSUM) {
00351           cerr << "   Checksum bits (?) : none (don't know how to do this yet)"<<endl;
00352         }
00353         // Now reinsert the header
00354         // first toss off the old one
00355         p.PopFrontHeader();
00356         // now push our modified one back on
00357         p.PushFrontHeader(iph);
00358         // and then copy it back out again for the rest
00359         iph=p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00360 
00361         cerr << "End of IP Diffusion stuff."<<endl;
00362 
00363 #endif
00364 
00365 
00366 
00367         // ROUTE
00368 
00369 
00370 
00371         // force route through gateway
00372 
00373 
00374 
00375 
00376         IPAddress ipaddr;
00377 
00378 #if FORCE_ROUTE_THROUGH_GATEWAY
00379         if (getenv("MINET_GATEWAY")) {
00380           ipaddr = IPAddress(getenv("MINET_GATEWAY"));
00381         } else {
00382           cerr << "Can't route to gateway as MINET_GATEWAY is not set=> Sending Direct.\n";
00383           iph.GetDestIP(ipaddr);
00384         }
00385 #else
00386         iph.GetDestIP(ipaddr);
00387 #endif
00388 
00389         ARPRequestResponse req(ipaddr,
00390                                EthernetAddr(ETHERNET_BLANK_ADDR),
00391                                ARPRequestResponse::REQUEST);
00392         ARPRequestResponse resp;
00393 
00394         MinetSend(arp,req);
00395         MinetReceive(arp,resp);
00396 
00397         if (resp.ethernetaddr!=ETHERNET_BLANK_ADDR) {
00398           resp.flag=ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_OK;
00399         }
00400 
00401         if ((resp.flag==ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_OK) ||
00402             (ipaddr == "255.255.255.255")) {
00403           // set src and dest addrs in header
00404           // set protocol ip
00405 
00406           EthernetHeader h;
00407           h.SetSrcAddr(MyEthernetAddr);
00408           h.SetDestAddr(resp.ethernetaddr);
00409           h.SetProtocolType(PROTO_IP);
00410           p.PushHeader(h);
00411 
00412           RawEthernetPacket e(p);
00413 
00414           cout << "ABOUT TO SEND OUT: " << endl;
00415           Packet check(e);
00416           check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00417           check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<IPHeader>(IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(check));
00418           // check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<ICMPHeader>(ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH);
00419           EthernetHeader eh = check.FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00420           IPHeader iph = check.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00421           // ICMPHeader icmph = check.FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00422 
00423           eh.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;
00424           iph.Print(cerr); cerr << endl;
00425           // icmph.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;
00426           cout << "END OF PACKET" << endl << endl;
00427 
00428 
00429           MinetSend(ethermux,e);
00430         } else {
00431           MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Discarding packet because there is no arp entry"));
00432           cerr << "Discarded IP packet because there is no arp entry\n";
00433         }
00434       }
00435     }
00436   }
00437   MinetDeinit();
00438   return 0;
